text: thumb Kattayattu Devi Kshethram is a Devi temple situated in Peruvayal, a village near Kozhikkode, India. ==Main deity== The deity worshipped in this temple is the goddess Devi in her two forms as Moovanthikkali and Arayil Bhagavathi. ==Other deities (Upadevathas)== Other deities worshipped in the temple are Lord Ganapathi and Lord Ayyappa. == Important days of the temple == *Paattulsavam *Prathishta dina varshikam *Pusthakapooja *Thottam ==References== Category:Bhagavathi temples in Kerala Category:Hindu temples in Kozhikode district
title: Sree Kattayattu Bhagavathi Kshethram
